ComicInfo.Summary: Eddie and Andy, the abused children who killed their father, escape their detention and find their way to New York City in search of their hero, Spawn. There, they are befriended by Snake who offers to employ Eddie to courier illegal packages for him. Snake forces Eddie to lead him to Spawn where a confrontation ensues. Snake is killed and Andy is wounded. After medical treatment, the boys return to the detention center, forever stripped of their innocence.
ComicInfo.Title: Orphans
